description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The True Intellectual System of the Universe ... With a Treatise concerning Eternal and Immutable Morality. To which are added, the notes and dissertations of Dr. J. L. Mosheim, translated by John Harrison ... With a copious general index to the whole work" Author: Cudworth, Ralph Contributor: HARRISON, John - M.A Contributor: MOSHEIM, Johann Lorenz von. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 722.i.9-11." Volume: 03 Page: 631 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1845 Publisher: Thomas Tegg Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000832665 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
